statements: DELETE FROM error_log WHERE correction_success = TRUE;
DELETE FROM error_log WHERE correction_success = FALSE AND correction_attempt_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM correction_log WHERE success = true;
DELETE FROM error_log WHERE correction_attempts > 5 AND error_message LIKE '%critical%'
DELETE FROM correction_log WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND success = false
DELETE FROM error_attempts WHERE attempt_id = 1001 AND log_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM error_logs WHERE error_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND error_description LIKE '%critical%';
DELETE FROM error_correction_procedures WHERE procedure_name = 'Verify data integrity';
DELETE FROM ErrorLogs WHERE error_code = 404 AND time_of_occurrence < '2022-01-01'::timestamp;
